mapper.select: select PRODUCTID, CKYPRODUCTID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, PRODUCTNAME, CKYPRODUCTNAME, CKYSTATUS, CATEGORYID, PRICE1, PRICE2, CKYSAVENUM, CKYORDERNUM, STATUS, LENGTH, WIDTH, HIGH, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, PACKINGTYPE, SHARER, DECLAREDVALUE, RESERVE8, RESERVE10, RESERVE9, DESCR, WAREHOUSE, WEIGHT, SELLNUM, AVAILSTOCK, TPNSAVENUM, SHARESTOCK from DB_CKYSKUCONFIG where PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
